channel.title: In need help for ip changing
channel.description: I have a problem when I change ip from 127.0.0.1 to mine i can't connect to server and other peoples. When ip is 127.0.0.1 then i can. Where is the problem?

item.title: In need help for ip changing
item.dc:creator: @Faknius Faknius
item.description:
@Faknius wrote:

How i can do that?

Read full topic
item.source: In need help for ip changing

item.title: In need help for ip changing
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Faknius:

I tryd to add in serverstatus and they told my your server is offline ,

You have not portforwarded properly to open ports 43594 so that you can register your server.

Read full topic
item.source: In need help for ip changing

item.title: In need help for ip changing
item.dc:creator: @Faknius Faknius
item.description:
@Faknius wrote:

Still not working. I tryd to add in serverstatus and they told my your server is offline , maybe i must change something in server source?

Read full topic

item.title: In need help for ip changing
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Same here but it’s different for other people I guess depending on their router

Read full topic
item.source: In need help for ip changing

item.title: In need help for ip changing
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

DAn I am not wrong most of the time the only way a host can connect to the client is by setting the ip to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 depending on the router some routers do allow you to connect through no-ip.

I have hosted a client before and i was able to log in from my no-ip.

Read full topic
item.source: In need help for ip changing

item.title: In need help for ip changing

@Dan0194 wrote:

Ultimate your wrong you can log in with no-ip for yourself too.

item.source: In need help for ip changing

item.title: In need help for ip changing
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Okay you must use 127.0.0.1 to login and the client you send to ppl must use your no-ip for example (YOURSERVERNAME.no-ip.org)

Read full topic
item.source: In need help for ip changing

item.title: In need help for ip changing
item.dc:creator: @Faknius Faknius
item.description:
@Faknius wrote:

Im creating a server everything is fine when i use 127.0.0.1 but when i change client ip to my no ip then i cant log in to server. Is this only for my? And if i send my client to peoples with no ip they can log in? and i must use 127.0.0.1 to play to? or nop?

Read full topic
item.source: In need help for ip changing

item.title: In need help for ip changing
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

127.0.0.1 is a host login which would be only your computer. Everytime you want to connect to someone elses server you would have to change it to their no-ip if you can’t connect then your client is not compatible with their server.

Read full topic
item.source: In need help for ip changing
